resources.string: CREATE TABLE LOCATION (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, LAT DECIMAL, LON DOUBLE, TYPE INTEGER, FORMATTED_ADDRESS VARCHAR (255), STREET_NUMBER VARCHAR (255), ROUTE VARCHAR (255), NEIGHBORHOOD VARCHAR (255), POSTAL_CODE VARCHAR (255), POSTAL_CODE_SUFFIX VARCHAR (255), CITY VARCHAR (255), COUNTY VARCHAR (255), STATE VARCHAR (255), COUNTRY VARCHAR (255)); COMMIT TRANSACTION;
